meanings.definition: A quick, easy pace or gait, as of a dog.
meanings.sent1: The dogtrots of the puppy were adorable to watch.
meanings.sent2: The dogtrots of the small dog were a joy to see in the park.
meanings.sent3: The dogtrots of the pug made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The dogtrots of the dachshund were like a little dance.
meanings.sent5: The dogtrots of the beagle were swift and rhythmic.

meanings.definition: To move or run at a quick, easy pace, like a dog.
meanings.sent1: She dogtrots around the yard every morning for exercise.
meanings.sent2: The dogtrots happily along the trail, enjoying the fresh air.
meanings.sent3: He dogtrots to the kitchen whenever he hears the treat bag.
meanings.sent4: The horse dogtrots gracefully across the field, resembling a dog's movement.
meanings.sent5: The child dogtrots to catch up with his friends playing in the park.
